This app uses YOLO v10n, a real-time object detection model capable of detecting cars, trucks, bikes, and pedestrians.
Depending on the selected direction, it counts the number of objects crossing a defined line.
- **YOLO v10n (You Only Look Once)**: Performs object detection in a single forward pass of the neural network, making it fast and efficient. - **SORT Algorithm (Simple Online and Realtime Tracker)**: Used for object tracking by associating detected objects between frames. - **Hungarian Algorithm**: Assigns objects between consecutive frames to maintain tracking accuracy. - **Kalman Filter**: Predicts the motion of detected objects, making tracking more robust to occlusions and noise.
